Text: Miss (I'm assuming!) Betty-Boop, THANK YOU SO MUCH! This is a TV series I remember fondly watching with my father when I was very young. He is gone now, but, thanks to you, I will always have Buck Twinki, Wilma, and Dr. Theopolis to remind me of him! Any chance of getting the rest of the series? I would appreciate it! THANK YOU once again Miss Boop! BIDIBIDIBIDI! I'm out!
